nl.strohalm.cyclos.dao.customizations

Interface ImageDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseDAO<Image>, DeletableDAO<Image>, InsertableDAO<Image>, UpdatableDAO<Image>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageDAOImpl

    public interface ImageDAO
extends BaseDAO<Image>, InsertableDAO<Image>, UpdatableDAO<Image>, DeletableDAO<Image>
    Interface for image DAO
    Author:
    rafael

    • Method Detail

      • countAdImages

        int countAdImages(Ad ad)
        Returns the number of images in the given advertisement

      • countMemberImages

        int countMemberImages(Member member)
        Returns the number of images in the given member

      • listByNature

        java.util.List<? extends Image> listByNature(Image.Nature nature)
                                             throws DaoException
        Lists images by nature and name, ordering by name. This method can only be used for the given natures: SYSTEM, CUSTOM or STYLE. If other nature is passed in, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation, it should be wrapped by a DaoException.

        Note that any java.hql.Blob attribute should be loaded transparently. Implementors are free to provide such behavior in the prefered way. Image's should be ready to use transparently, even if lazy loading of Blob's is used.

        Parameters:
        nature - nature of the image
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • listByOwner

        java.util.List<? extends OwneredImage> listByOwner(Entity owner)
        List images by owner, ordering by the image order

      • load

        Image load(Image.Nature nature,
         java.lang.String name)
           throws EntityNotFoundException,
                  DaoException
        Loads for a specific image based on its nature and name. This method can only be used for the given natures: SYSTEM, CUSTOM or STYLE. If other nature is passed in, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown. If no such Image can be found, throws an EntityNotFoundException. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation, it should be wrapped by a DaoException.

        Note that any java.hql.Blob attribute should be loaded transparently. Implementors are free to provide such behavior in the prefered way. Image's should be ready to use transparently, even if lazy loading of Blob's is used.

        Parameters:
        nature - nature of the image
        name - the name is not case sensitive
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - The specified image does not exists
        DaoException
